show_name: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai.
other_title: My Little Sister Can't Be This Cute 2
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai 2
俺の妹がこんなに可愛いわけがない。
opening_theme: #2: "Hoshikuzu Cosplay☆Witch! Desu! Omega! (星くずこすぷれ☆うぃっち！です！)" by Bridget Evans (CV: Misaki Kuno) (ep 10)
